challengeFiles.name: styles

tests.text: Your .calories-info selector should have a display property set to flex.
Your .calories-info selector should have a justify-content property set to space-between.
Your .calories-info selector should have a align-items property set to flex-end.

description: Create a new .calories-info selector and give it a display property set to flex. Also give it a justify-content property set to space-between and align-items property set to flex-end.
